definition: composed of heterogeneous elements gathered into a mass, a group of diverse companies under common ownership and run as a single organization, to collect or gather
details:
adjective
- composed of heterogeneous elements gathered into a mass
= example: composed of heterogeneous elements gathered into a mass
noun
- a group of diverse companies under common ownership and run as a single organization
= synonyms: empire
- a composite rock made up of particles of varying size
= synonyms: pudding stone
verb
- to collect or gather
= synonyms: gather
